items.question: How are productized services different from traditional consulting?
items.answer: Productized services have fixed scope, clear deliverables, and predictable timelines. You know exactly what you're getting and when. No scope creep, no endless discovery phases.

items.question: What if our needs don't fit a standard package?
items.answer: We customize within the productized framework. During discovery, we adapt the package to your specific systems and workflows while maintaining timeline predictability.

items.question: Do you provide ongoing support after delivery?
items.answer: Yes. Our Managed Improvements package provides continuous optimization, feature additions, and priority support. Many clients start with a sprint and transition to managed services.

items.question: What technologies do you use?
items.answer: We're technology-agnostic and select tools based on your needs. Common choices include modern data platforms (Snowflake, BigQuery), BI tools (Power BI, Tableau), and automation platforms (Make, Zapier, custom APIs).

items.question: How quickly can we get started?
items.answer: Most projects start within 2-3 weeks of signing. We book discovery sessions, align on goals, and begin execution rapidly.
